name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One Publish - Cross-publish to DEV, Hashnode, Medium & more

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cross-publish your content directly from Notion to DEV, Hashnode, Medium, Ghost, LinkedIn and more upcoming platforms.

- All your content managed in Notion.
- Simple extension as your gateway to publishing.
- Enhance SEO and reach more people.

Here's the steps to follow:

1. Connect to Notion.
2. Connect to platform.
3. Select platforms to publish.
4. Publish with one click.

Simplify your publishing process, focus on creating great content.
